quest.name: Cooler than Being Cool
journal:
 Quest Sync
Marvene is thinking long and hard about how best to acquire what she needs.
objectives: Obtain ice crystals from center somas.
Deliver the soma ice crystals to Marvene.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: Why, hello there. Hmmm, let me guess...you're an adventurer? A mercenary for hire, willing to stand against any beast, so long as the reward is commensurate?

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: Well then, I've the job for you and a prize to match.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: I'm in need of two rather unique crystals, which can be obtained from somas─ice giants of fierce repute. You'll find the frigid fiends lumbering about southeast of here. So, if you wouldn't mind?

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: Bring me the crystals I've asked for, and you will have your reward. Should be easy enough work for you, I imagine. You seem like the sort of womanman who has seen herhis fair share of scrapes.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: Still in one piece, are you? Very good. Now, have you the crystals?

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: Yes, exactly what I was looking for. Excellent work.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: I see that glint in your eyes. You wish to know how I mean to use them, don't you? Then allow me to satisfy your curiosity. As you know, Kokkol and his fellow fools have seen fit to amplify fire-aspected aether using the reactor.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: I see that glint in your eyes. You wish to know how I mean to use them, don't you? Then allow me to satisfy your curiosity as much as I'm able. Something foul is afoot with the reactor. I've heard tell that dangerous plans are in motion as we speak.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: Abnormal heat signals have been detected in a portion of the aether conductor running beneath our feet. These ice crystals can counteract these undue temperature spikes by forcibly cooling the affected areas.

dialogue.name: MARVENE
dialogue.text: But enough about me and my woes. You have more than earned your reward, adventurer. Should I need any assistance in the future, I will be sure to call upon you and your expertise.
